- (void) drawImage: (NSImage *)  image
inBounds: (NSRect)  rect 

draw image for iChat Theater We synchronise to make sure we're not drawing in two threads simultaneously.

- (BOOL) _checkHasChanged: (BOOL)  flag  

The _hasChanged flag is set to 'NO' after any check (by a client of this class), and 'YES' after a frame is drawn that is not identical to the previous one (in the drawInBounds: method). Returns the current state of the flag, and sets it to the passed in value.

- (BOOL) checkHasChanged  

Calling with 'NO' clears _hasChanged after the call (see above).

- (void) showIChatHelp  

Show help window for iChat theater
